tourist_places.name: Burj Khalifa
tourist_places.description: The tallest building in the world, offering panoramic views of Dubai's skyline and the Arabian Gulf. Burj Khalifa features observation decks, luxury hotels, and fine dining restaurants.

tourist_places.name: Palm Jumeirah
tourist_places.description: An artificial island in the shape of a palm tree, featuring luxury resorts, residential villas, and entertainment attractions. Palm Jumeirah is known for its upscale amenities and beachfront properties.

tourist_places.name: Dubai Mall
tourist_places.description: One of the world's largest shopping malls, offering a vast array of retail outlets, restaurants, entertainment venues, and leisure attractions. Dubai Mall also features the Dubai Aquarium and Underwater Zoo.

tourist_places.name: Dubai Marina
tourist_places.description: A waterfront district in Dubai featuring luxury skyscrapers, promenades, and marinas. Dubai Marina is a popular destination for dining, shopping, and leisure activities such as yacht cruises and watersports.
